claim.text: LLMs given different personas wrote in different styles.
claim.exact_quote: First, we want to check whether different personas in Reddit indeed exhibit different writing styles. Our observation is that there are clear differences of writing styles across different personas in the same category.

evidence.evidence_text: For example, in the profession category, engineers’ writing styles lean towards ‘Inquiry’ and ‘Analytical,’ whereas chefs are more ‘Judgmental’ and ‘Cheerful.’
evidence.limitations: Limited to specific categories (profession) and styles (Inquiry, Analytical, Judgmental, Cheerful)
evidence.exact_quote: For example, in the profession category, engineers’ writing styles lean towards ‘Inquiry’ and ‘Analytical,’ whereas chefs are more ‘Judgmental’ and ‘Cheerful.’

evidence.evidence_text: Figure 4: Different writing styles based on real Reddit comments among different socio-demographic groups.
evidence.limitations: Visual representation, limited to specific categories (age, location, profession, political affiliation)
evidence.exact_quote: Figure 4: Different writing styles based on real Reddit comments among different socio-demographic groups.

conclusion.key_limitations: The analysis is based on a specific set of personas and LLMs, which might not be representative of all possible personas and LLMs.

claim.text: Different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.
claim.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: Based on our observations with the three LLMs (i.e., Llama, Mistral, and GPT) as discussed above, we find that different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.

evidence.evidence_text: Based on our observations with the three LLMs (i.e., Llama, Mistral, and GPT) as discussed above, we find that different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.
evidence.limitations: Based on observations, not direct experimental results
evidence.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: Based on our observations with the three LLMs (i.e., Llama, Mistral, and GPT) as discussed above, we find that different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.

conclusion.key_limitations: The analysis is based on a specific set of personas and LLMs, which might not be representative of all possible personas and LLMs.

claim.text: Llama often has a style that is very similar to the informal, conversational style used on Reddit.
claim.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: Llama often has a style that is very similar to the informal, conversational style used on Reddit. This suggests Llama may work well for replicating the casual, discussion-based style typical on Reddit while having discussions.

evidence.evidence_text: Llama often has a style that is very similar to the informal, conversational style used on Reddit.
evidence.limitations: Based on observations, not direct experimental results, limited to Llama
evidence.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: Llama often has a style that is very similar to the informal, conversational style used on Reddit.

conclusion.key_limitations: The claim is based on a general observation of Llama's style, but might not hold true in all cases or for all personas.

claim.text: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas, with a distinct professional pattern.
claim.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas. Its style is very professional and formal, contrasting with the more casual Reddit style. This distinct professional pattern might make Mistral suitable for formal communications or discussions requiring a proper style.

evidence.evidence_text: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas, with a distinct professional pattern.
evidence.limitations: Based on observations, not direct experimental results, limited to Mistral
evidence.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas, with a distinct professional pattern.

conclusion.key_limitations: The claim is based on a general observation of Mistral's style, but might not hold true in all cases or for all personas.

claim.text: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas.
claim.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas. Its style deviates somewhat from Reddit but not as extremely as Mistral. This balance makes GPT versatile, potentially appealing to audiences that value both critical analysis and professional discourse.

evidence.evidence_text: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas.
evidence.limitations: Based on observations, not direct experimental results, limited to GPT
evidence.location: Section 4.3 Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas.

conclusion.key_limitations: The claim is based on a general observation of GPT's style, but might not hold true in all cases or for all personas.
